property.name: Rules
property.value: A creature equipped with this gets 'speed attacker' and can't be destroyed while attacking. Dragsolution: When any of your Dragons attacks, if that is the second Dragon that attacked this turn, after the attack, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Whenever this creature attacks or whenever your opponent chooses this creature, put a dragheart creature that costs 10 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. That creature gets 'speed attacker' until the end of the turn. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may put a Light creature that has 'blocker' from your hand into the battle zone. Non-light spells cost 1 more to cast. Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if you have 3 or more creatures that have 'blocker' in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Your Light creatures win all battles. Players can't cast non-Light spells that cost 5 or less. Triple breaker Escape

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cards in your mana zone are considered to be cards of every civilization. Whenever one of your Dragons would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead. Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, you may return 5 Dragons from your mana zone to your hand. If you do, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cards in your mana zone are considered to be cards of every civilization. Whenever creatures attack, your opponent chooses one of his untapped creatures and puts it in his mana zone. Quattro breaker Dragon Evade

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them. Those creatures don't untap at the start of the opponent's next turn. Double breaker Mana Arms 9: While you have 9 or more light cards in your mana zone, you can't lose the game and your opponent can't win.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature or one of your other Command Dragons into the battle zone, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Your opponent chooses a spell from among them, and you put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, cast that spell for no cost. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy any number of your other creatures. For each destroyed creature, your opponents chooses a card from his hand and discards it. When this creature or one of your other creatures are destroyed, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it. Double breaker

card.name: D Soul Battle 3rd Generation, Passion Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple Sympathy: Fire Dragon (When you summon this creature, you may pay 3 less for each of your fire Dragons in the battle zone. It can't cost less than 1.) When you put this creature or another Dragon into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. The Dragon and the chosen creature battle. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck to all players. Add any number of nature creatures from among it that have different costs into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck. Mana Arms 7: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 7 or more nature cards in your mana zone, you may put a non-evolution creature from your hand into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sympathy: Light creature that costs 3 or less (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your Light creatures that cost 3 or less in the battle zone. It can't cost less than 1.) {BLOCKER} Double breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your Light creatures that cost 3 or less in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature, you may shuffle any number of spells from your graveyard into your deck. For each spell put into your deck, this creature costs 1 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1. Triple breaker Whenever you cast a water spell, you may choose a card in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: At the end of your turn, if this creature is in your graveyard and you have 5 or more darkness cards in your mana zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, put this creature into the battle zone. Mana Arms 7: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 7 or more darkness cards in your mana zone, choose any number of Funky Knightmares that have total cost of 5 or less from your graveyard and put them into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle, put a fire weapon that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (Equip it to this creature.) Mana Arms 7: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 7 or more fire cards in your mana zone, put a fire weapon that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Weapons that have the same name can't be equipped to this creature. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker When this creature or one of your other nature dragons are destroyed, you may put a creature that costs less than that creature from your mana zone into the battle zone. When this creature loses a battle against a creature that has more power than this creature, put that creature into it's owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a light dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) While you have a light dragheart in the battle zone, this creature gets 'blocker'. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 3 or more light cards in your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. Mana Arms 5: When this creature would leave the battle zone and has power 0 or more, if you have 5 or more light cards in your mana zone, this creature stays in the battle instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Gravity Zero-If your opponent has 5 or more cards in his graveyard, you may summon this creature for no cost. This creature can't attack. When you put this creature into the battle zone, each player shuffles all cards in his graveyard into his deck.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, discard a card from your opponent's hand at random for each of your Funky Knightmares in the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. This creature gets +1000 power for each of your Funky Knightmares in your graveyard. While this creature has power 6000 or more, it gets 'double breaker'.

card.name: Roar of Destruction, Dragon Secret Formation

property.name: Rules
property.value: One of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone gets -1000 power for each of your Dragons in your mana zone until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: The equipped creature gets 'power attacker +2000' and the Gaial Command Dragon race. Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if the equipped creature is tapped, flip this dragheart to the creature side. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your other creatures in the battle zone gets the Gaial Command Dragon race. Power Attacker +2000 Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each Dragon in your mana zone, look at the top card of your deck. You may put a non-evolution Dragon from among it that costs 8 or less into the battle zone and put the rest on the bottom of the deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a nature dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Whenever you summon a creature or cast a spell, you may tap a light card, a water card, a darkness card, a fire card and a nature card in your mana zone instead of paying it's cost. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever this creature attacks, you may put a creature that has 'Paras' in its name from your mana zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each Dragon in your mana zone, look at the top card of your deck. Put any number of dragons from among them into your mana zone and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your Command Dragons in the battle zone gets 'blocker'. (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, you may tap a creature that has 'blocker' to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Choose a non-evolution card that costs 6 or less in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each Dragon in your mana zone, look at a card on the top of your deck. Choose one of them and add it to your shields face down. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 3 or more water cards in your mana zone, you may draw a card. Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more water cards in your mana zone, this creature can't be attacked or blocked.

card.name: Dragon Knowledge Technique, Dragon Secret Formation

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each dragon in your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may take a spell from among them, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Charger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature is destroyed, this creature gets +2000 power until the end of the turn. While this creature has power 6000 or more, it gets 'double breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets 'slayer' until the end of the turn. (Whenever a creature that has 'slayer' battles, destroy the opponent's creature after the battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revenge Chance—At the end of each of your opponent's turns, if he put a creature from his hyperspatial zone into the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature battles that creature. While battling, this creature gets +2000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, put a fire dragheart that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If its a weapon, equip it to this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3: If you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature can't be attacked by creatures that cost 4 or less. Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets 'double breaker' and 'power attacker +4000'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker When this creature or one of your other Command Dragons would be destroyed, put them into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 3 or more nature cards in your mana zone, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Mana Arms 5: When this creature would be destroyed, if you have 5 or more nature cards in your mana zone, put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
